info.description: This provides the REST API for admin operations
info.title: Pulsar Admin REST API

get.summary: Get the stats for the Netty allocator. Available allocators are 'default' and 'ml-cache'
Get pending bookie client op stats by namesapce
Broker availability report
get.description:
This API gives the current broker availability in percent, each resource percentage usage is calculated and thensum of all of the resource usage percent is called broker-resource-availability

THIS API IS ONLY FOR USE BY TESTING FOR CONFIRMING NAMESPACE ALLOCATION ALGORITHM

get.summary: Get all the destination stats by namesapce
Get Load for this broker
Get all the mbean details of this broker JVM
Gets the metrics for Monitoring
get.description: Requested should be executed by Monitoring agent on each broker to fetch the metrics

get.summary: Get all updatable dynamic configurations's name
Get value of all dynamic configurations' value overridden on local config

post.summary: Update dynamic serviceconfiguration into zk only. This operation requires Pulsar super-user privileges.

403.description: You don't have admin permission to update service-configuration

get.summary: Get the list of active brokers (web service addresses) in the cluster.
Get the list of namespaces served by the specific broker
Get the list of all the Pulsar clusters.
Get the configuration data for the specified cluster.

post.summary: Update the configuration for a cluster.
post.description: This operation requires Pulsar super-user privileges.

put.summary: Provisions a new cluster. This operation requires Pulsar super-user privileges.

403.description: You don't have admin permission to create the cluster

get.summary: Get the namespace isolation policies assigned in the cluster
Get a single namespace isolation policy assigned in the cluster

post.summary: Set namespace isolation policy

403.description: Don't have admin permission or plicy is read only
Don't have admin permission or plicy is read only

get.summary: Get the list of all the namespaces for a certain property.
Get the list of all the namespaces for a certain property on single cluster.
Get the dump all the policies specified for a namespace.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

put.summary: Creates a new empty namespace with no policies attached.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

delete.summary: Delete a namespace and all the destinations under it.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

post.summary: Set a backlog quota for all the destinations on a namespace.

412.description: Specified backlog quota exceeds retention quota. Increase retention quota and retry request

delete.summary: Remove a backlog quota policy from a namespace.

get.summary: Get backlog quota map on a namespace.
Get the bundles split data.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

412.description: Namespace is not setup to split in bundles

post.summary: Clear backlog for all destinations on a namespace.
Clear backlog for a given subscription on all destinations on a namespace.

get.summary: Get the list of all the destinations under a certain namespace.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

get.summary: Get the message TTL for the namespace

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

post.summary: Set message TTL in seconds for namespace

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

get.summary: Retrieve the permissions for a namespace.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

post.summary: Grant a new permission to a role on a namespace.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

delete.summary: Revoke all permissions to a role on a namespace.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

get.summary: Get the persistence configuration for a namespace.

post.summary: Set the persistence configuration for all the destinations on a namespace.

get.summary: Get the replication clusters for a namespace.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

post.summary: Set the replication clusters for a namespace.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

412.description: Namespace is not global or invalid cluster ids

get.summary: Get retention config on a namespace.

post.summary: Set retention configuration on a namespace.

412.description: Retention Quota must exceed backlog quota

put.description: Unload an active namespace from the current broker serving it. Performing this operation will let the brokerremoves all producers, consumers, and connections using this namespace, and close all destinations (includingtheir persistent store). During that operation, the namespace is marked as tentatively unavailable until thebroker completes the unloading action. This operation requires strictly super user privileges, since it wouldresult in non-persistent message loss and unexpected connection closure to the clients.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

412.description: Namespace is already unloaded or Namespace has bundles activated

post.summary: Unsubscribes the given subscription on all destinations on a namespace.

delete.summary: Delete a namespace bundle and all the destinations under it.

404.description: Property or cluster or namespace doesn't exist

post.summary: Clear backlog for all destinations on a namespace bundle.
Clear backlog for a given subscription on all destinations on a namespace bundle.
Unsubscribes the given subscription on all destinations on a namespace bundle.

get.summary: Get the list of destinations under a namespace.
Get the list of partitioned topics under a namespace.

delete.description: The topic cannot be deleted if there's any active subscription or producer connected to the it.

post.summary: Expire messages on all subscriptions of topic.

404.description: Topic or subscription does not exist

get.summary: Get estimated backlog for offline topic.
Get the internal stats for the topic.
Get the internal stats for the topic.
Get the stats for the partitioned topic.
Get partitioned topic metadata.

post.summary: Increment partitons of an existing partitioned topic.
post.description: It only increments partitions of existing non-global partitioned-topic

put.description: It needs to be called before creating a producer on a partitioned topic.

delete.description: It will also delete all the partitions of the topic if it exists.

get.summary: Get permissions on a destination.
get.description: Retrieve the effective permissions for a destination. These permissions are defined by the permissions set at thenamespace level combined (union) with any eventual specific permission set on the destination.

post.summary: Grant a new permission to a role on a single destination.

delete.description: Revoke permissions to a role on a single destination. If the permission was not set at the destinationlevel, but rather at the namespace level, this operation will return an error (HTTP status code 412).

412.description: Permissions are not set at the destination level

get.summary: Get the stats for the topic.

delete.description: There should not be any active consumers on the subscription.

post.summary: Expire messages on a topic subscription.

404.description: Topic or subscription does not exist

get.summary: Peek nth message on a topic subscription.

404.description: Topic, subscription or the message position does not exist

post.summary: Reset subscription to message position closest to absolute timestamp (in ms).
post.description: There should not be any active consumers on the subscription.

post.summary: Skip messages on a topic subscription.

404.description: Topic or subscription does not exist

post.summary: Skip all messages on a topic subscription.
post.description: Completely clears the backlog on the subscription.

404.description: Topic or subscription does not exist

get.summary: Get the list of persistent subscriptions for a given topic.
Get the list of properties.
Get the admin configuration for a given property.

post.summary: Update the admins for a property.
post.description: This operation requires Pulsar super-user privileges.

put.description: This operation requires Pulsar super-user privileges.

delete.summary: elete a property and all namespaces and destinations under it.

409.description: The property still has active namespaces

get.summary: Get the default quota

post.summary: Set the default quota

get.summary: Get resource quota of a namespace bundle.

post.summary: Set resource quota on a namespace.

delete.summary: Remove resource quota for a namespace.
